name: Prime Suspect
description:
Welcome to Spitfire, California! Play as Charlotte, a young detective who came back home to awaited murder mysteries. Solve the cases in this captivating narrative driven adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, question suspects, and collect clues/evidence to accuse the Prime Suspect. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?
FEATURES:
• Choose your path in this immersive visual story!
• Examine crime scenes for clues and look for evidence
• Interrogate suspects by asking the right questions
• Accuse and bring the killer to justice
